hero.subtitle: Professional driving test learning platform with comprehensive question banks for subjects 1 & 4. Multi-language support for efficient study and first-time success!

features.title: Core Features
features.subtitle: Comprehensive driving test learning solutions designed to make your preparation more efficient and convenient

practice.title: Professional Question Bank
practice.description: Massive curated question bank with categorized practice and personalized learning paths for maximum efficiency

progress.title: Progress Tracking
progress.description: Real-time learning progress tracking with data visualization and scientific review planning

bookmarks.title: Wrong Question Collection
bookmarks.description: One-click bookmark for difficult questions with smart review reminders to strengthen weak points

accident.title: Accident Case Studies
accident.description: Real accident case analysis to enhance safe driving awareness and emergency response skills

cta.title: Ready to Start Your Driving Test Journey?
cta.subtitle: Join us and experience the most professional driving test learning platform. Make passing your test easier!

footer.description: Professional driving test practice platform with multi-language support to help you pass your driving test with ease

section1.title: 1. Terms of Service
section1.content: By registering and using DriveEasy Pass, you agree to comply with the following terms.

section2.title: 2. User Responsibilities
section2.content: You are responsible for protecting your account information, including your username and password.

section3.title: 3. Service Content
section3.content: We provide driving test practice, accident records, and related services.

section4.title: 4. Privacy Protection
section4.content: We are committed to protecting your personal information. See our Privacy Policy for details.

section1.title: 1. Information Collection
section1.content: We only collect information necessary to provide our services.

section2.title: 2. Information Use
section2.content: Your information is used solely to improve service quality and user experience.

section3.title: 3. Information Protection
section3.content: We adopt industry-standard security measures to protect your information.

section4.title: 4. Information Sharing
section4.content: We will not share your personal information with third parties without your consent.

validation.email: Please enter a valid email address
validation.phone: Please enter a valid phone number
validation.passwordStrength: Password must be at least 8 characters, including uppercase, lowercase, and numbers
validation.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 6 characters
validation.usernameFormat: Username can only contain letters, numbers, and underscores
validation.usernameLength: Username must be between 3 and 50 characters

accident.title: Accident Records
accident.subtitle: Record and manage traffic accident information, generate professional reports
accident.noReportsDesc: Click the button above to create your first accident report
accident.enterOtherPartyInfo: Please enter information about the other vehicle/driver...
accident.uploadTip: Supports JPG, PNG formats, max 10MB per image

photos.safetyFirst: Please ensure your safety while taking photos
photos.clickToSimulate: Click camera icon to simulate taking photos. Ensure photos are clear and information is fully visible.
photos.sceneGuide: Capture the accident scene overview, including road conditions, traffic signs, and vehicle positions
photos.frontGuide: Photograph front vehicle damage, including bumper, lights, license plate, etc.
photos.sideGuide: Photograph side vehicle damage, including doors, windows, tires, etc.
photos.rearGuide: Photograph rear vehicle damage, including rear bumper, taillights, license plate, etc.
photos.detailGuide: Take close-up photos of specific damage areas, ensuring damage details are clearly visible
photos.driverLicenseGuide: Photograph both sides of the other party's driver license, ensuring name, license number, and validity period are clear
photos.vehicleLicenseGuide: Photograph both sides of the other party's vehicle registration, ensuring license plate number, owner information, and insurance details are clear
photos.autoUpload: Photos will be automatically uploaded when saving the report, no separate upload needed

pdf.contentChanged: Content changes detected, new PDF report generated!
pdf.confirmRegenerate: Are you sure you want to forcefully regenerate the PDF report? This will delete the old PDF file and generate a new report.
pdf.contentUnchanged: Content unchanged, using existing PDF file.
pdf.whatToDo: What would you like to do?
pdf.allowPopups: Please allow popups to preview PDF
pdf.rightClickSave: PDF download failed, please try right-click save
pdf.reportNotFound: Report not found or access denied
pdf.serverError: Server error, please try again later
pdf.fileNotFound: PDF file not found, please generate PDF first
pdf.openingDownload: Opening PDF download in new tab

steps.responsibilityDesc: Fill in party information and responsibility determination
steps.signatureDesc: Both parties sign to confirm the agreement
steps.completionDesc: Vehicle removal reminder and follow-up guidance

accident.selfNegotiationAgreement: Motor Vehicle Traffic Accident Self-Negotiation Agreement
accident.agreementTerms: Both parties, based on the provisions of the Road Traffic Safety Law and other laws and regulations, on the basis of equality, voluntariness, and fairness, have reached the following agreement on the handling of this traffic accident:
accident.agreeToTerms: I have read and agree to the above agreement terms
accident.processingConditionsText: When motor vehicles have property damage traffic accidents and the parties have no dispute over the facts and causes, they can immediately evacuate the scene, restore traffic, and negotiate damage compensation on their own.
accident.condition1: Property damage traffic accident between motor vehicles
accident.condition2: Parties have no dispute over facts and causes
accident.step1: Stop immediately and turn on hazard warning lights
accident.step2: Check for casualties, call police immediately if any
accident.step3: Take photos of accident scene and record vehicle positions
accident.step4: Move vehicles to a location that does not obstruct traffic
accident.step5: Fill out the quick accident processing agreement
accident.note1: If there are casualties, call police immediately, quick processing does not apply
accident.note2: If there is dispute over accident facts, call police immediately
accident.note3: Drunk driving, drug driving and other violations do not apply to quick processing
accident.confirmReadGuidelines: I have read and understood the above processing guidelines
accident.pleaseReadGuidelines: Please read the processing guidelines first
accident.photoTip1: Please take photos while ensuring your safety
accident.photoTip2: Ensure photos are clear and information is complete and visible
accident.photoTip3: Take photos from different angles and types as required
accident.damageDetailDesc: Photograph specific damage areas in detail
accident.driverLicenseDesc: Photograph both sides of other party's driver license
accident.vehicleLicenseDesc: Photograph both sides of other party's vehicle registration
accident.confirmDeletePhoto: Are you sure you want to delete this photo?
accident.reportCompletedDesc: Your accident report has been successfully created
accident.trafficViolationWarning: Failure to evacuate the scene promptly will be treated as traffic violation
accident.completionMessage: Congratulations on completing all steps of the accident report. Please follow the subsequent guidance to handle related matters.
accident.contactInsuranceDesc: Contact insurance company for claim reporting in time
accident.vehicleRepairDesc: Contact repair shop for vehicle repair
accident.followUpClaimDesc: Follow up on insurance claim progress
accident.shareReportText: I just completed an accident report
accident.shareNotSupported: Your browser does not support sharing function
accident.locationInputTip: Tip: Please describe the accident location in detail, including province, city, district, street, house number, etc.
accident.pleaseEnterLocationOrGetLocation: Please enter accident address or get location information
accident.locationAddressPlaceholder: Please enter the detailed address of the accident, e.g.: No. 123 Wensan Road, Xihu District, Hangzhou City, Zhejiang Province
